pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Fourze (2011, TV show)$(br2)Used to access Fourze's $(l:fourze/riders/fourze#magnetstates)Magnetstates$(/l) and $(l:fourze/riders/fourze#n_magnet)N Magnet Module$(/l)
